The game it selves could be such a good game.
Counter Strike was allways my game to play. I've played css and 1.6 too.
The Pro's :
A great way to learn swarwords in multiple languages.
i've met alot of very nice people over this game, some even being very close friends till this date.
I've learned to play as a team, and that team ecconomy realy does matter.

Cons:
Cheaters, cheaters every where.
Back in the day you where like: " Damn he hit's some nasty shots" , now: "Damn he hits some nice shots, mostlikely cheating".
The AC doesn't rly work.
You've need to play external party services to play less against cheaters.
Since it went F2P it declined in gamevalue and fun to play.

How to cheat in CSGO, the method I recommend: directly enter QUIT in the console. People with depraved minds, I curse you for falling into hell

The game itself is pretty bad, lots of cheaters everywhere + bots + 64 tick servers. 
- The only reason to not have 128 tick servers is the pure greed of Valve. Because they exactly know that third party systems do the work for them, same goes for the useless VAC system.
- The new ancient map replaces train, which does not make sense unfortunately.
- Skins are what makes Valve the money, unfortunately we don't see this money invested back into the game.
- Ancient has so many horrific performance issues, it seems like the development was really sloppy on this one, especially the testing, cs is a competitive game and having a good FPS count is a lot more important than having a bit neater graphics...
- With all the negativity and Valves incompetence of handling the game, the first iterations of cs were a masterpiece and the core gameplay is more or less the same (fortunately, besides jumping headshots, first bullet accuracy, really outdated engine for todays standard etc.).
- The demo viewing tool is 10+ years old, what a joke...
- The community server finder is also 10+ years old, they don't even bother at all...
- Because the idea is so good behind the game, people playing this for the first time with friends in a mm game will have fun, therefore I will recommend this game even with Valve in mind and the people that get fed all of our skins money and we never see it again in any form.
